<!-- WARNING: this file was generated by Pulumi Docs Generator. -->
<!-- Do not edit by hand unless you're certain you know what you are doing! -->

Manages Cloud Native Anti-DDos Basic resource within HuaweiCloud.

> The Cloud Native Anti-DDos Basic resource will be set to the default traffic cleaning threshold when destroyed,
  instead of deleting it.

<div><pulumi-examples>

## Example Usage

<div><pulumi-chooser type="language" options="typescript,python,go,csharp,java,yaml"></pulumi-chooser></div>





<div>
<pulumi-choosable type="language" values="csharp">

```csharp
using System.Collections.Generic;
using Pulumi;
using Huaweicloud = Pulumi.Huaweicloud;

return await Deployment.RunAsync(() => 
{
    var config = new Config();
    var eipId = config.RequireObject<dynamic>("eipId");
    var antiddos1 = new Huaweicloud.AntiDDos.Basic("antiddos1", new()
    {
        EipId = eipId,
        TrafficThreshold = 150,
    });

});
```


</pulumi-choosable>
</div>


<div>
<pulumi-choosable type="language" values="go">

```go
package main

import (
	"github.com/huaweicloud/pulumi-huaweicloud/sdk/go/huaweicloud/AntiDDos"
	"github.com/pulumi/pulumi/sdk/v3/go/pulumi"
	"github.com/pulumi/pulumi/sdk/v3/go/pulumi/config"
)

func main() {
	pulumi.Run(func(ctx *pulumi.Context) error {
		cfg := config.New(ctx, "")
		eipId := cfg.RequireObject("eipId")
		_, err := AntiDDos.NewBasic(ctx, "antiddos1", &AntiDDos.BasicArgs{
			EipId:            pulumi.Any(eipId),
			TrafficThreshold: pulumi.Int(150),
		})
		if err != nil {
			return err
		}
		return nil
	})
}
```


</pulumi-choosable>
</div>

```java
package generated_program;

import com.pulumi.Context;

import com.pulumi.core.Output;
import com.pulumi.huaweicloud.AntiDDos.Basic;
import com.pulumi.huaweicloud.AntiDDos.BasicArgs;
import java.util.List;
import java.util.ArrayList;
import java.util.Map;
import java.io.File;
import java.nio.file.Files;
import java.nio.file.Paths;

public class App {
    public static void main(String[] args) {
        Pulumi.run(App::stack);
    }

    public static void stack(Context ctx) {
        final var config = ctx.config();
        final var eipId = config.get("eipId");
        var antiddos1 = new Basic("antiddos1", BasicArgs.builder()        
            .eipId(eipId)
            .trafficThreshold(150)
            .build());

    }
}
```

## Basic Resource Properties {#properties}

To learn more about resource properties and how to use them, see [Inputs and Outputs](/docs/intro/concepts/inputs-outputs) in the Architecture and Concepts docs.

### Inputs

The Basic resource accepts the following [input](/docs/intro/concepts/inputs-outputs) properties:



<div>
<pulumi-choosable type="language" values="csharp">
<dl class="resources-properties"><dt class="property-required property-replacement"
            title="Required">
        <span id="eipid_csharp">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#eipid_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Eip<wbr>Id</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>Specifies the ID of an EIP. Changing this creates a new resource.</p>
</dd><dt class="property-required"
            title="Required">
        <span id="trafficthreshold_csharp">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#trafficthreshold_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Traffic<wbr>Threshold</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">int</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>Specifies the traffic cleaning threshold in Mbps.
The value can be 10, 30, 50, 70, 100, 120, 150, 200, 250, 300, 1000 Mbps.</p>
</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="region_csharp">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#region_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Region</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>Specifies the region in which to manage the Cloud Native Anti-DDos Basic resource.
If omitted, the provider-level region will be used. Changing this creates a new resource.</p>
</dd></dl>
</pulumi-choosable>
</div>

    <dd><p>Specifies the ID of an EIP. Changing this creates a new resource.</p>
</dd><dt class="property-required"
            title="Required">
        <span id="trafficthreshold_yaml">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#trafficthreshold_yaml" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">traffic<wbr>Threshold</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">Number</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>Specifies the traffic cleaning threshold in Mbps.
The value can be 10, 30, 50, 70, 100, 120, 150, 200, 250, 300, 1000 Mbps.</p>
</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="region_yaml">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#region_yaml" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">region</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">String</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>Specifies the region in which to manage the Cloud Native Anti-DDos Basic resource.
If omitted, the provider-level region will be used. Changing this creates a new resource.</p>
</dd></dl>
</pulumi-choosable>
</div>

## Look up Existing Basic Resource {#look-up}

Get an existing Basic resource's state with the given name, ID, and optional extra properties used to qualify the lookup.
<div>
<pulumi-chooser type="language" options="typescript,python,go,csharp,java,yaml"></pulumi-chooser>
</div>

<div>
<pulumi-choosable type="language" values="javascript,typescript">
<div class="highlight"><pre class="chroma"><code class="language-typescript" data-lang="typescript"><span class="k">public static </span><span class="nf">get</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">name</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="nx">string</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="nx">id</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="nx"><a href="/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#ID">Input&lt;ID&gt;</a></span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="nx">state</span><span class="p">?:</span> <span class="nx">BasicState</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="nx">opts</span><span class="p">?:</span> <span class="nx"><a href="/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#CustomResourceOptions">CustomResourceOptions</a></span><span class="p">): </span><span class="nx">Basic</span></code></pre></div>
</pulumi-choosable>
</div>

        <span id="state_trafficthreshold_go">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#state_trafficthreshold_go" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Traffic<wbr>Threshold</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">int</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>Specifies the traffic cleaning threshold in Mbps.
The value can be 10, 30, 50, 70, 100, 120, 150, 200, 250, 300, 1000 Mbps.</p>
</dd></dl>
</pulumi-choosable>

## Import



Cloud Native Anti-DDos Basic resources can be imported using `eip_id`. e.g.

```sh
 $ pulumi import huaweicloud:AntiDDos/basic:Basic antiddos_1 c5256d47-8f9e-4ae7-9943-6e77e3d8bd2d
```
